title: Design and Development of a Tape-Type Vibrotactile Feedback System
venue: IEEE Conference on Virtual Reality and 3D User Interfaces Abstracts and Workshops (VRW)
authors: Carlos Paniagua, **Hiroki Ota**, Yutaro Hirao, Monica Perusquia-Hernandez, Hideaki Uchiyama, Kiyoshi Kiyokawa

abstract.ja: テープ型の振動触覚フィードバックシステムの設計と開発について報告する。
abstract.en: We present the design and development of a tape-type vibrotactile feedback system.
